Articles.Content: Wow, I mean, just holy wow...
I read about this in gameinformer. Seemed really cool.

Just imagine how awesome this would be if done on a PC ;P

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
I\'ve seen this before, it is very promising.

I\'ve thought about stuff like this, what it means to be alive.

It\'s not about being human, but what makes a consciousness.

After a lot of thought, the definition of living shrivels into having consciousness.

This video pretty much encapsulates a lot of what I\'ve thought about.

That looks like an AWESOME concept for a game. I mean, I don\'t think I would play it as such, but still. The graphics look pretty good (until you look really close-up, anyway). Shame it isn\'t for the PC.

I guess I\'ll have to wait for ArmA III to have such good graphics, and then that\'s if my graphics card can handle it...

So yeah, great concept!

I\'ve thought about stuff like this, what it means to be alive.

It\'s not about being human, but what makes a consciousness.

After a lot of thought, the definition of living shrivels into having consciousness.

This video pretty much encapsulates a lot of what I\'ve thought about.

But, then, Bacteria are considered to be living... and yet - at least we presume - they have no consciousness.

But, then, Bacteria are considered to be living... and yet - at least we presume - they have no consciousness.

Er, by living I didn\'t mean the definition of life.

I meant what my existence/life means.

Sorry
That guy\'s going to get fired. Feels more like it should be a movie than a game.

That guy\'s going to get fired. Feels more like it should be a movie than a game.

I like movie-games. Like The Walking Dead, Movie-Games are very easy to get into and appreciate
